Model

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Engine for the Game. Created by Oguz Demir on 23.4.2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEngine(int[][] map, int n, boolean twoPlayers, GameManager gManager)
      Constructor called by Controller.GameManager with 2D array holding the wall map and the dimension size.

      In singleplayer game, elapseTime method is called by Controller.GameManager to advance game with directions of players

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameEngine

        public GameEngine(int[][] map,
                  int n,
                  boolean twoPlayers,
                  GameManager gManager)
        Constructor called by Controller.GameManager with 2D array holding the wall map and the dimension size. Also, gametype is given with a boolean
        Parameters:
        map - map for the game.
        n - grid size of the game.
        twoPlayers - playing or not.
        gManager - Game manager reference for the game.

    • Method Detail

      • addScore

        public void addScore(int index,
                     int score)
        Increase the score.
        Parameters:
        index - player1 or 2.
        score - to increase.

      • serveGameMap

        public void serveGameMap()
        Send game data to the manager after every action.

      • killBombers

        public void killBombers(boolean b)
        Kill all bombers.
        Parameters:
        b - timer ends or not.

      • elapseTime

        public int elapseTime(int x1,
                      int y1,
                      boolean b1)
        In singleplayer game, elapseTime method is called by Controller.GameManager to advance game with directions of player
        Parameters:
        x1 - movement in x axis for player1's bomber
        y1 - movement in y axis for player1's bomber
        b1 - is action flag for dropping bomb for player1's bomber
        Returns:
        flag for indicating game is ended or not.

      • elapseTime

        public int elapseTime(int x1,
                      int y1,
                      boolean b1,
                      int x2,
                      int y2,
                      boolean b2)
        In singleplayer game, elapseTime method is called by Controller.GameManager to advance game with directions of players
        Parameters:
        x1 - movement in x axis for player1's bomber
        y1 - movement in y axis for player1's bomber
        b1 - is action flag for dropping bomb for player1's bomber
        x2 - movement in x axis for player2's bomber
        y2 - movement in y axis for player2's bomber
        b2 - is action flag for dropping bomb for player2's bomber
        Returns:
        flag for indicating game is ended or not.

      • changeWallType

        public void changeWallType(Wall w)
        Change the wall type.
        Parameters:
        w - reference to the damaged wall.

      • deleteGameObject

        public void deleteGameObject(GameObject object)
        Method is called for deleting an object from game
        Parameters:
        object - is object to be deleted.

      • dropPowerUp

        public void dropPowerUp(int x,
                        int y)
        Drop new power ups to the game map.
        Parameters:
        x - position of the power up.
        y - position of the power up.
